objects.text:
• Classic retro-styled design
• X-Trans CMOS II sensor
• Fast autofocus system
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity

Limited time offer. Capture every
moment with double the value!

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Real-time electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Versatile 3-inch tilting LCD screen for creative angles
• Fast autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for instant photo sharing
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Film simulation modes to achieve various creative styles
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Ideal for both beginners and enthusiast photographers

banner_details:
This promotional banner has a professional and tech-savvy aesthetic, designed to advertise a camera product. The background employs a deep diagonal gradient transitioning from navy blue to dark indigo, accented by an orange polygonal overlay on the bottom right, creating contrast and focus. The banner places the product image on the right, partially overlapping sections of colored overlays for visual depth.

The "heading" layer uses bold white uppercase typography to draw immediate attention. "subheading" follows below it in a vibrant orange shade, emphasizing the product type. A list of product features is detailed in the "description" section, aligned neatly to the left in smaller white text. 

The "tagline" stands out in bold orange, suggesting a promotional offer, followed by "offer_description" in a clean white font that supports the urgency and value of the deal. The "price" is prominently displayed below in large white numeric characters with a rupee symbol, indicating affordability.

A bright orange rectangular "cta_button" is accompanied by centered "cta" black text prompting users to take action. The layout strategically guides the viewer's eyes from top left to bottom right through the visual elements and typography.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#0c1e3e`
- Deep Navy: `#000a14`
- Vibrant Orange: `#FF8c00`
- Burnt Orange: `#FF4500`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Black: `#000000`
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, professional aesthetic dominated by deep matte black (#1C1C1C) and soft metallic black (#2E2E2E) tones. Accents of white (#FFFFFF) are used for branding and dial markings, offering high contrast and clarity. Touches of vibrant red (#C0392B) and orange-yellow (#F39C12) on the lens add a pop of color, subtly drawing attention to functional details without overwhelming the minimalist palette. The lens reflection introduces subtle hints of teal green (#3FBFA9) and pale yellow (#FDE396), enriching visual interest. These colors can be harmoniously used in an advertisement banner, blending professional elegance with dynamic tech appeal.
